name: Last Sage
description:
Our hero is the last sage in the world and is destined to destroy the great evil.

He even has powers ton control time. So, be the hero and pass through all the obstacles to reach the Evil and destroy it :D .

Controls:

A, D : Move

Space : Jump

Shift : Dash

Left mouse button : Swing Sword

Right Mouse Button : Special Power

E : Switch Special Power

Shift : Dash
